title: Bug 2246DnD in Navigator: line suggests ordering is possible (1GEAUIG)
description: When dragging an item in the Navigator, it shows a horizontal line between items, and allows a drop when shown.This suggests that the items can be ordered, but the Navigator always shows elements in sorted order, so order does not matter.NOTES:NE (5/25/01 4:45:50 PM)Note that the Packages View does not do this.Nor does Windows Explorer.
